name: The Shard
description:
This project was created for the "Grand Space Opera: Light Age"  Game Environment / Level Art challenge on ArtStation (2021).

See the challenge submission here: https://www.artstation.com/contests/grand-space-opera-light-age/challenges/97/su...

Controls:  You can fly around with WASD + mouse
(exit with alt+F4)

Warning: this is not really a game, but an environment showcase.

Created with Unreal Engine 4.25, content created with Houdini 18.5 using Megascan textures.

Thanks for downloading!
